name: Anacã 2
description:
Second of the "Anacã collection" series
The Anacã is a bird from the Amazon forest in northern Brazil, and whose name means "dance" or "bird that dances" in some languages of the Tupi family. A.k.a Deroptyus accipitrinus or red-fan parrot.

The still illustration used as base for this animation was originally meant to be used in a children's book about animals.

Animals are sentient individuals, not property or objects.

Part of the oBRjkt2 event.

Illustration & animation by Zamahel
